newsitem.title: USA: Most U.S. debt futures close choppy trade weaker.
newsitem.headline: Most U.S. debt futures close choppy trade weaker.

text.p: U.S. debt futures closed choppy afternoon trading mostly lower, with the long end holding moderate losses and ending below key technical levels.
After the quick early pullback, March Treasury bond futures reverted to range-trading, staying mainly between 110-24/32 and 111-00 from midmorning forward.
The contract, which upticked early on signs of slack chain-store sales last week, showed scant reaction late after signs that retail sales firmed in December from November.
BTM/Schroders chain stores sales fell 1.0 percent, but Redbook sales rose 0.7 percent December versus November.
